tableExports.title: All Reliquary Data
tableExports.description: The complete Reliquary dataset as a JSON file.

rawGameFiles.title: Attach Effect Names
rawGameFiles.description: This is a file directly exported from SmithBox, and contains the names of each effect.

rawGameFiles.title: Attach effect parameters
rawGameFiles.description: This is a file directly exported from SmithBox, and contains the definitions of each effect's paremeters

rawGameFiles.title: Attach effect table parameters
rawGameFiles.description: This is a file directly exported from SmithBox, and contains the pairings of effects and their chanceweights.

supplementalFiles.title: Compatibility mappings
supplementalFiles.description: A manually created file that assigned in-game Effect Categories to the Effect Category IDs used in the Attach Effect data.

supplementalFiles.title: Reliquary SQL export
supplementalFiles.description: The complete SQL query that shows how I've taken the Raw and Supplemental files, and turned them into the data you see in the application
